On 2/23/07, Rahul Chandrashekar <crahul@...> wrote:
> On 2/23/07, Swetha Pathak <swethapathak@...> wrote:
> > Am new to JUnit and J2EE.Can anyone guide me how to add JUnit plug-in
> > for RAD. I want to create JUnit test cases for the web application I
> > built in RAD 6.0.
>
> Even I have been trying to the same ; but had been unsuccessful. Can u
> give some tips to accomplish the needful

RAD comes out of the box with the JUnit plug-in. You don't need to "add" it.
Regarding how to get started using RAD's JUnit plug-in, I'd suggest
googling for "eclipse junit tutorial" and checking out one of the many
hits.

Lasse
